content.text: Pole signs are the best type of signs a business can use because not only do they let people know that you are in the area, they also tell people that you are open and ready to assist.
Royal Signs & Awnings is the best in pole sign design, manufacturing, and installation in Katy, TX.
Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation!
Illuminated or lighted pole signs are special pole signs that can be lit open late at night, allowing travelers to see your business from a mile away.
We can also do pylon and tenant signs that are higher than your business building.
Contact Royal Signs & Awnings for a free consultation. Call (281) 645-9935!
